title: Expanding classroom: Eveline Lowe
creator_credit: BBC, ILEA, Eileen Molony and George Inger
brief_description: An example of a purpose-built open-plan English primary school, run on co-operative teaching lines, and where parents are welcome to participate in dialy activities of the school.
